name: The Ins and Outs of Escapism
name_original: The Ins and Outs of Escapism
description:
It's hard to escape when you're not quite sure what it means to exit.

Very short experiment in subverting expectations, puzzles and interactions.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

E/Click - Interact

Other specifics indicated in-game. Incomplete controller support.

Mac and Linux build provided as-is, can't really test them.
